title: What does encantado mean? - Answers
text: Encantado means 'Enchanted' but in every day language means 'to be pleased' as in 'Encantado conocerte' = Pleased to meet you it may also be useful for you to know that "encantador' or encantadora when refering to females means ' charming' Translation: Encantado(a) a conocer-vos. Encantado. This word is used for enchanted, charmed and haunted, depending on the context. Encanto = enchantment. This is Amalia, my best friend. You could answer back by saying (to Amalia); "Mucho gusto" o "Encantado/a de conocerle" (Depending on whether you're male/female) One is used for a boy and the other is used for a girl. the one ending in a is girl and the one ending in o is for boys
